W

WAIT_TIME - Static variable in class WaitAnalogSensor
Constant that defines the time to wait (in milliseconds) before making a new check to finish the wait.
WAIT_TIME - Static variable in class WaitTouchSensor
Constant that defines the time to wait (in milliseconds) before making a new check to finish the wait.
WaitAnalogSensor - Class in <Unnamed>
WaitAnalogSensor, used to generalize all analog sensor waiting classes.
WaitAnalogSensor(boolean, byte) - Constructor for class WaitAnalogSensor
Constructor method, creates a new wait by setting the comparison value and if it must be bigger than the value read by the sensor.
waitLight() - Method in class WaitLightSensor
Main method that finishes the wait based on the comparison value.
WaitLightSensor - Class in <Unnamed>
WaitLightSensor, used to wait a value on a light sensor.
WaitLightSensor(LightSensor, byte, boolean) - Constructor for class WaitLightSensor
Constructor method, defines the sensor, the comparison value and if it must be bigger than the value read by the sensor.
WaitLightSensor(SensorPort, byte, boolean) - Constructor for class WaitLightSensor
Constructor method, defines the sensor port, the comparison value and if it must be bigger than the value read by the sensor.

Constructor method, creates the wait by setting the motor and the comparison value.
waitMotor() - Method in class WaitMotor
Wait the motor rotations based on the comparison value.

WaitSoundSensor(SoundSensor, byte, boolean) - Constructor for class WaitSoundSensor

WaitSoundSensor(SensorPort, byte, boolean) - Constructor for class WaitSoundSensor
Constructor method, defines the sensor port, the comparison value and if it must be bigger than the value read by the sensor.
